item.name: Add a new product to a business's catalogue

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Watties Baked Beans - 420g can",
    "id": "WATT-420-BEANS",
    "description": "Baked Beans as they should be.",
    "manufacturer": "Heinz Wattie's Limited",
    "recommendedRetailPrice": 2.2
}
